name: CricketUnfiltered
0:
”Alexa, launch cricket unfiltered”
”Alexa, open cricket unfiltered”
”Alexa, start cricket unfiltered”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cricket unfiltered
Developer Terms of Use
des:
If you love cricket then this podcast is for you. Get closer to the game than ever before with in-depth analysis, discussion and debate. The podcast is produced by Andrew Menczel for Newscorp. The show features a wide variety of cricket journalists, current players and retired cricket greats. This is must listen for cricket fans. Subscribe now!
NOTE:
As soon as you open/launch the podcast, you will be playing the latest episode by default, but you can always find something more specific. Read HOW TO USE instructions below

HOW TO USE:
To Get Started: Say "Alexa, open ‘cricket unfiltered’”.

Next/Previous
When a podcast is playing, you can say "Alexa, Next" or "Alexa, Previous" to play the next or previous episode.

Fast Forward
If you want to skip ahead, you can say "Alexa, ask ‘cricket unfiltered’ to fast forward 2 minutes"

Rewind
if you want to go back, you can say "Alexa, ask ‘cricket unfiltered’ to rewind 30 seconds"

Specific Episode
You can also use ‘Episode No’ to play specific episodes
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
